column5: Anyone got a trailer I can borrow for an evening to get the boat home? It's a 15' fibreglass (not a car topper). I live in Erin and the boat is in Toronto (Dixon/401)  Thanks  Curt
Ahhhh, uh, what do you mean by "free boat"? Would the person who let's you borrow his trailer be an accessory to a crime? lol
HAHA! No the guy bought this boat just for the trailer. So now it sits in hid driveway with no trailer or motor. She's a fixer- upper. I just need to get her home.

Oh ok... it just seemed "fishy"! lol  Sorry I don't have a trailer but I'm sure someone on here will be able to help you out... maybe in exchange for taking them out once you get her fixed up!  Oh, now that you have the boat, shouldn't you buy a trailer anyway?

Waiting to find a free one haha. No, I can't afford one right now. Saving for a house and waiting for my house to sell in Newfoundland. The little money I have will go into fixing up the boat right now.
